title: Discolored, Horizontal, Half-Line Across Screen
content:
I've had my Pixel 3 for several months and it just recently started to have this half-line appear across the screen at random times. It is a distorted, discolored, horizontal line that runs from the left edge towards the middle of the screen. It happens when scrolling and sometimes when the screen is not being moved or pressed.

I tried rebooting the device, turning off Apps, Safe Mode, and testing the screen, but the line still pops up.

The problem is the same from this post but I do not know what the resolution was. 
https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/621872?hl=fr
